meanings.definition: A type of fish that belongs to the family Centrarchidae.
meanings.sent1: The pond was full of colorful sunfishes swimming gracefully.
meanings.sent2: We went fishing and caught some sunfishes for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The sunfishes had a party in the underwater castle.
meanings.sent4: The sunfishes danced in the sunlight, their scales shimmering.
meanings.sent5: Children love to watch the sunfishes play hide and seek among the rocks.

meanings.definition: Plural form of sunfish, referring to multiple fish of the sunfish family.
meanings.sent1: The lake was teeming with sunfishes of all sizes.
meanings.sent2: The aquarium displayed a variety of sunfishes from different regions.
meanings.sent3: The sunfishes gathered for a family reunion under the lily pads.
meanings.sent4: The sunfishes swam together like a moving mosaic in the water.
meanings.sent5: The sunfishes darted around, creating ripples in the calm pond.
